name: Homemade, Easy, No-Bake Peanut Butter Cups or Bars
recipeYield: 6 to 8 large peanut butter cups or bars
recipeIngredient: 1 cup finely crumbled or processed graham crackers (The finer the better--you can also substitute other cracker or cereal 'crumbs' although the results will be slightly less 'Reese's' in style)
1 /2 (generous) cup of peanut butter (I used smooth Jif)

recipeInstructions.text: Cream butter, sugar, and peanut butter together.
Add butter, sugar, and peanut butter mixture to crumbs, stir vigorously until thoroughly blended.
Press mixture in cupcake liners or a parchment-lined 8x8 inch pan.
Melt chocolate in microwave or over bain maire. Pour or spoon chocolate over peanut butter mixture. Spread or distribute evenly
Chill for 2-3 hours, or until firm enough to serve. If making bars, score pan after five minutes of chilling.
